程序包 org.apache.giraph.partition
的使用

  • 使用org.apache.giraph.partition的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.giraph.bsp
    Package of generic bulk synchronous processing objects.
    org.apache.giraph.comm
    Package of communication related objects, IPC service.
    org.apache.giraph.comm.netty
    Package for netty implementations.
    org.apache.giraph.comm.requests
    Package for requests.
    org.apache.giraph.conf
    Package of Giraph configuration related things.
    org.apache.giraph.graph
    Package of all the graph related objects, built on the org.apache.bsp package.
    org.apache.giraph.integration
    Package of all helper integration test objects.
    org.apache.giraph.partition
    Package of partitioning related objects.
    org.apache.giraph.worker
    Package of all the worker related things
  • org.apache.giraph.bsp使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    GraphPartitionerFactory
    Defines the partitioning framework for this application.
    PartitionOwner
    Metadata about ownership of a partition.
    PartitionStats
    Used to keep track of statistics of every Partition.
    PartitionStore
    Structure that stores partitions for a worker.
  • org.apache.giraph.comm使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    Partition
    A generic container that stores vertices.
    PartitionOwner
    Metadata about ownership of a partition.
    PartitionStore
    Structure that stores partitions for a worker.
  • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    Partition
    A generic container that stores vertices.
    PartitionOwner
    Metadata about ownership of a partition.
  • org.apache.giraph.comm.requests使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    Partition
    A generic container that stores vertices.
  • org.apache.giraph.conf使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    GraphPartitionerFactory
    Defines the partitioning framework for this application.
    Partition
    A generic container that stores vertices.
    PartitionContext
    PartitionContext allows for the execution of user code on a per-partition basis.
  • org.apache.giraph.graph使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    PartitionContext
    PartitionContext allows for the execution of user code on a per-partition basis.
    PartitionOwner
    Metadata about ownership of a partition.
    PartitionStats
    Used to keep track of statistics of every Partition.
  • org.apache.giraph.integration使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    GraphPartitionerFactory
    Defines the partitioning framework for this application.
    HashPartitionerFactory
    Divides the vertices into partitions by their hash code using a simple round-robin hash for great balancing if given a random hash code.
    MasterGraphPartitioner
    Determines how to divide the graph into partitions, how to manipulate partitions and then how to assign those partitions to workers.
  • org.apache.giraph.partition使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    BasicPartition
    Basic partition class for other partitions to extend.
    BasicPartitionOwner
    Basic partition owner, can be subclassed for more complicated partition owner implementations.
    GraphPartitionerFactory
    Defines the partitioning framework for this application.
    HashWorkerPartitioner
    Implements hash-based partitioning from the id hash code.
    MasterGraphPartitioner
    Determines how to divide the graph into partitions, how to manipulate partitions and then how to assign those partitions to workers.
    Partition
    A generic container that stores vertices.
    PartitionContext
    PartitionContext allows for the execution of user code on a per-partition basis.
    PartitionExchange
    Describes what is required to send and wait for in a potential partition exchange between workers.
    PartitionOwner
    Metadata about ownership of a partition.
    PartitionStats
    Used to keep track of statistics of every Partition.
    PartitionStore
    Structure that stores partitions for a worker.
    RangePartitionOwner
    Added the max key index in to the PartitionOwner.
    RangeSplitHint
    Hint to the RangeMasterPartitioner about how a RangePartitionOwner can be split.
    ReusesObjectsPartition
    Empty interface to characterize Partition implementations that don't keep references to the Vertex objects they are passed.
    WorkerGraphPartitioner
    Stores the PartitionOwner objects from the master and provides the mapping of vertex to PartitionOwner.
  • org.apache.giraph.worker使用的org.apache.giraph.partition中的类 
    类和说明
    PartitionOwner
    Metadata about ownership of a partition.
    PartitionStats
    Used to keep track of statistics of every Partition.
    PartitionStore
    Structure that stores partitions for a worker.
